title: Software Change Log
description: Added a software change log that all developers may view.

title: Application Review Functions added
description: Each application should now be reviewed before it is deployed to the production system. A new 'Reviews' page is available from the application overview page. Also the application overview marks passed reviews in green.

title: Fixed: 'Back' on 'New Application' page
description: The 'back' button at the bottom of the new application page does no longer lead to a non existing page.

title: Publisher meta-field added
description: Applications and Plugins may now have a publishing organization in addition to the developing organization. Enter the publisher on the application settings page.

title: Hide security critical CHANGELOG entries
description: Text/Description from security critical entries of the changelog are not displayed online.

title: Fixed: Only consent owner may confirm!
description: Only consent owner may set consent status to active using the API. Changed for STU3 and R4.

title: Licence checker for apps and plugins
description: Applications may now require a licence to be used. Licences may be issued to single users, teams or organizations. For the initial release licences may be granted by an administrator only and may have a time restriction.

title: Remove version number from nginx. Security fixes for 2Fa login.
Updated library versions for portal.
Fixed fullscreen view for plugins did not work.
Address only required on profile if already present.
Account unlocked/locked status changes are recorded in Audit Log.
Improved layout on mobile devices
description: Menu bar closes automatically on click. No shadows around views.

title: Simplified consent screen
description: Simplified mobile version. Removed unnecessary buttons.

title: Added client side check for password strength
Do now allow empty access filter for apps and plugins
Fixed email sending if receiver name unknown
Registration link for invitation emails
description: Consent creation notifications for non Midata users may now contain a link to the registration page.

title: Each user role may have own terms and conditions
Added Virusscan for file uploads
description: All files uploaded to the platform are now checked for viruses. If a virus is detected the file is removed from the platform.

title: Only files with a recognized file extension may be uploaded.
description: Executable files and scripts will be rejected.

title: Links to terms and conditions and privacy policy on page footer are now role specific
Patient registration for HP
description: Healthcare providers may now register patient accounts.

title: Fixed: Licence checker could not check team licences correctly.
Added study code and name as type to participant identifiers.(FHIR R4)
Fixed bugs in STU3 to R4 conversion
Added FHIR ValueSet Resource for R4
Fixed $document operator
description: The composition resources $document operator did not return all linked resources.

title: Splitted Midata Registration and App Confirmation

changeId: # PLEASE LEAVE AS LAST LINE. HAVE YOU UPDATED PORTAL VERSION??
